attributes.action: introduce Fixed Term parliaments for Westminster
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is surely an outdated concept that the Prime Minister of the day can have the starter's pistol in his/her hand to call an election when the time suits. The UK should join the 21st century and introduce fixed term elections  - be this 4 or 5 years - but there can be no future left in elections being called when the leader of a political party sees fit to do so.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
